Table 1: Validation Error of Image Classification	ResNet50	SIFT	compositenumber of parameter	25636712	2884200	3000Validation Error (%)	70.1184	13.1252	71.5079Proof. (Proof Sketch) The idea is directly solve the inequality for the case of K = 2, and thengeneralize the result to larger K.	□The following provides a generalized error bound for a composite neural network.
